bill_title: require cigarettes to be delivered to a certain location in South Dakota before sale and delivery to any South Dakota retailers.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require cigarettes to be delivered to a certain location in South Dakota before sale and delivery to any South Dakota retailers. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 10-50-25 be amended to read as follows: 10-50-25. When If the secretary of revenue and regulation shall find finds that the collection of the tax imposed by this chapter would be facilitated thereby, he the secretary may authorize any person , resident or located outside this state, engaged in the business of selling and shipping cigarettes into this state and purchasing at least seventy-five percent of such cigarettes from the cigarette manufacturers thereof , and who is a resident of any state authorizing by law the licensing of nonresidents, including residents of this state, to distribute cigarettes therein, upon after complying with the requirements of the secretary of revenue and regulation , to import unstamped cigarettes to a facility located within South Dakota to which all cigarettes shall be delivered and deposited prior to sale of any cigarettes to any South Dakota retailer. The distributor shall affix or cause to be affixed the stamps required by this chapter on behalf of the purchasers of such cigarettes , who would otherwise be taxable therefor, and the . The secretary of revenue and regulation may sell such stamps to such person as hereinbefore provided, or the secretary of revenue and regulation may authorize the use of a metering machine by such person as hereinbefore provided .

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
